attributes.action: To create Carbon Dioxide Extraction Machine Plants in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If we create a Mechnized Carbon Dioxide Extractors which takes in atmosphere separates the carbon dioxide and other greenhouse gases. Then store those gases underground or use the addtional carbon dioxide as firefighting equipment or other alternative ways. The science is there to do this. If we can invest in other way to reduce CO2 in the atmosphere, we can then help stop global warming and control it.
